school.name: Shree Shanti Bhagawati Secondary School
school.about: Shree Shanti Bhagawati Secondary School is a community school located in Letang, Morang, Nepal. It was established in 2009 B.S. and has been providing quality education to the local community ever since. The school is committed to fostering a conducive learning environment and promoting holistic development among its students.
